mapper.select: select memberSeq, id, password, name, nickName, phone, birth, gender, email, address from tblMember where id= #{id} and password = #{password}

select * from ( select p.projectseq from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where f.regdate <= sysdate and f.regdate > sysdate - 10 and startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate and p.status = 'y' and p.deleteok = 'n' group by p.projectseq order by count(*) desc) where ROWNUM <= 8

select * from ( select p.projectseq from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where p.startdate <= sysdate and p.enddate >= sysdate and status = 'y' and deleteok = 'n' group by p.projectseq, p.target having p.target-sum(pp.price) > 0 order by p.target-sum(pp.price)) where ROWNUM <= 8
select * from ( select projectseq from tblProject where startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate and status = 'y' and deleteok = 'n' order by TRUNC(sysdate)-startdate) where rownum <= 8

select p.projectseq, p.name, p.teamname, m.name as userName, enddate-TRUNC(sysdate) as meantime, p.target, p.thumImage from tblProject p inner join tblMember m on m.memberseq = p.memberseq where projectseq = #{seq}

select sum(pp.price) as totalPrice from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where p.projectseq = #{seq} group by p.projectseq order by p.projectseq
